original_title: Cuck My Life And Fuck My Wife
overview: Karma's husband can't please her so to punish him she locks him in a dog crate while he watches her fuck another man. Angela hires a photographer to take some sexy photos of her; the problem is that she ends up fucking the guy... while her husband watched! All Alison's husband wants to do is please her, but unfortunately when he shows up at her office with flowers she's already being pleased by another man! Sophia is distraught over the death of her husband and she needs someone to comfort her. Luckily, at the funeral she finds that someone and she takes his dick right in front of her husband's open casket!
tagline: Wives get fucked while husbands watch!
title: Cuck My Life And Fuck My Wife
